Items.Title: A Local Law in relation to renaming two thoroughfares and public places in the Borough of the Bronx, East 177th Street, and to amend the official map of the city of New York accordingly.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Name Change, Renaming two thoroughfares and public places, Bronx, East 177th Street.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the Metropolitan Transportation Authority and all other appropriate entities to support a Hudson River Greenway between Spuyten Duyvil and Yonkers to provide riverfront access in a continuous stretch concurrent with the Metro-North line extending from Manhattan to Westchester.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: MTA and all other appropriate entities to support a Hudson River Greenway between Spuyten Duyvil and Yonkers to provide riverfront access in a continuous stretch concurrent with the Metro-North line extending from Manhattan to Westchester.

Items.Title: A Local Law in relation to renaming two thoroughfares and public places in the Borough of the Bronx, East 177th Street, and to amend the official map of the city of New York accordingly.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Name Change, Renaming two thoroughfares and public places, Bronx, East 177th Street.
